summary: Earlier this year, I picked up a Canon R100 and have been using it to motivate myself to get out on weekends. I’d be lying if I didn’t mention the influence of Pauli B’s Walkie Talkie series.
title: New York City

summary: Puducherry (or Pondicherry) was my first solo trip, as best I recall, and gave me glimpses of myself I hadn’t seen before. Then again, I hadn’t seen beaches till then, so there’s that.
title: Pondicherry
